## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

- **Frontend:** React.js (Class-based Components)
- **Styling:** Bootstrap 5, Custom CSS
- **Routing:** React Router v6
- **API:** [NewsData.io](https://newsdata.io/) or [NewsAPI.org](https://newsapi.org/)
- **Loading Bar:** react-top-loading-bar
